channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- NEX-Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- NEX-Forms

item.title: CVE-2021-24705|2024-08-03T19:42:16.117Z -- unknown -- nex-forms
item.description: The NEX-Forms WordPress plugin before 8.4.3 does not have CSRF checks in place when editing a form, and does not escape some of its settings as well as form fields before outputting them in attributes. This could allow attackers to make a logged in admin edit arbitrary forms with Cross-Site Scripting payloads in them
